meanings.definition: A large, heavy motor vehicle used for transporting goods or materials.
meanings.sent1: The trucks carried boxes of fruits to the market.
meanings.sent2: The delivery trucks arrived at the warehouse early in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The trucks lined up at the loading dock, eager to start their journey.
meanings.sent4: The trucks rumbled through the night, their headlights piercing the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The shiny red trucks stood out against the gray cityscape.

meanings.definition: A small, wheeled platform used for moving heavy objects.
meanings.sent1: The workers used trucks to transport the heavy equipment across the factory floor.
meanings.sent2: She wheeled the truck filled with books to the library shelves.
meanings.sent3: The tiny toy truck struggled to carry the oversized marble.
meanings.sent4: The old truck creaked under the weight of the furniture.
meanings.sent5: The metal truck gleamed under the sunlight as it rolled along the sidewalk.

meanings.sent1: They will truck the supplies to the construction site tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: He trucks the goods from the warehouse to the store every week.
meanings.sent3: She decided to truck the furniture across town instead of hiring a moving company.
meanings.sent4: The company trucks the products to different cities for distribution.
meanings.sent5: The farmer trucks the fresh produce to the market early in the morning.
